name: Large bedroom- easy access to Boston and Cambridge
neighborhood_overview: The house is conveniently located close to the city but exposed to traffic noise.
description:
Large bedroom with queen size bed, hardwood floor in a beautifully furnished and decorated apartment. Open space living room/dining room, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, disposal, open space living room, dining room, sun room, and large bathroom. The apartment is right next to orange line T station (10 min to downtown Boston) and bus hub (easy access to Cambridge/Harvard Sq). You can use public transport to get to Airport, most schools/Universities, hospitals, museums.

The space
You might be sharing the apartment with other Airbnb guests so I ask everyone to keep your personal belongings in your room and common areas clean (no dishes in sink).

Guest access
The apartment and your room has key pad locks. You will receive a 4 digit number to open the locks so no keys necessary.
Free hi-speed internet, and basic cable.
There is a free laundry in basement (please do not use between 10-2pm (I use it during that time when there
